Package ru.ashemchuk.player

Class Dealer

java.lang.Object
ru.ashemchuk.player.Player
ru.ashemchuk.player.Dealer
public class Dealer extends Player
Represents a dealer in a card game, extending the Player class. The dealer has special rules and capabilities, including managing a hole card (face-down card) and following specific drawing rules during their turn.

  • Constructor Details

    • Dealer

      public Dealer(Hand hand)
      Constructs a Dealer with the specified hand.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • getHoleCard

      public Card getHoleCard()
      Returns the dealer's hole card (face-down card).
      Returns:
      the hole card, or null if no hole card has been set

    • takeCard

      public void takeCard(Deck deck, boolean isHole)
      Takes a card from the deck, optionally marking it as a hole card. If the card is marked as a hole card, it will be stored separately and displayed face down until revealed.
      Parameters:
      deck - the deck to draw from
      isHole - true if the card should be marked as a hole card, false otherwise

    • turn

      public boolean turn(Deck deck)
      Executes the dealer's turn according to standard casino rules. The dealer must draw cards until their hand total reaches 17 or higher.
      Parameters:
      deck - the deck to draw from
      Returns:
      true if the dealer should continue drawing (hand total less than 17), false if the dealer should stop (hand total 17 or higher)

    • openHoleCard

      public void openHoleCard()
      Reveals the dealer's hole card by turning it face up. This is typically done at the end of all player turns.

    • getTitle

      public String getTitle()
      Returns the title used for displaying the dealer.
      Specified by:
      getTitle in class Player
      Returns:
      the string "Dealer"
